v-model.type: string | number | Date | Array<string | number | Date>

default-value.type: string | number | Date | Array<string | number | Date>

readonly.description: Whether it is in read-only mode

error.description: Whether it is in an error state

format.description: For the format of the display date, refer to the string parsing format
format.description_zh: 展示日期的格式，参考字符串解析格式

size.description: Enter the size of the field

:step.type: { hour?: number; minute?: number; second?: number;}
:step.description: Set the selection interval for Hours/Minutes/Seconds
:step.description_zh: 设置 时 / 分 / 秒 的选择间隔

hide-disabled-options.description: Hide the option to prohibit selection

disable-confirm.description: Disable the confirmation step, and you don't need to click the confirmation button to select the time directly after opening
disable-confirm.description_zh: 禁用确认步骤，开启后直接点选时间不需要点击确认按钮

v-model:popup-visible.description: Controls the pop-up box to turn on or off
v-model:popup-visible.description_zh: 控制弹出框打开或者关闭

default-popup-visible.description: The pop-up box is turned on or off by default
default-popup-visible.description_zh: 弹出框默认打开或者关闭

:trigger-props.description: You can pass in the parameters of the Trigger component
:trigger-props.description_zh: 可以传入 Trigger 组件的参数

unmount-on-close.description: Whether or not to destroy the DOM structure after closing
unmount-on-close.description_zh: 是否在关闭后销毁 dom 结构

events.name: change
events.params: timeString: string | Array<string | undefined> | undefined, time: date | Array<date | undefined> | undefined

events.name: select
events.description: The time is selected but the component value change is not triggered
events.description_zh: 选择时间但未触发组件值变化
events.params: timeString: string | Array<string | undefined>, time: Date | Array<Date | undefined>

events.name: popup-visible-change
events.description: The pop-up box expands and collapses
